At the beginning of your upkeep, return a blue creature you control to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Miren, the Moaning Well
mc.oracleText:
{T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

mc.name: Sunder from Within
mc.oracleText: Destroy target artifact or land.

mc.name: Captive Flame
mc.oracleText: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

mc.name: Scroll of Origins
mc.oracleText: {2}, {T}: Draw a card if you have seven or more cards in hand.

mc.name: Shinen of Fear's Chill
mc.oracleText:
Shinen of Fear's Chill can't block.
Channel - {1}{B}, Discard Shinen of Fear's Chill: Target creature can't block this turn.

mc.name: Into the Fray
mc.oracleText:
Target creature attacks this turn if able.
Splice onto Arcane {R} (As you play an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

mc.name: Nightsoil Kami
mc.oracleText: Soulshift 5 (When this is put into a graveyard from play, you may return target Spirit card with converted mana cost 5 or less from your graveyard to your hand.)

mc.name: Dense Canopy
mc.oracleText: Creatures with flying have "This creature can't block creatures without flying."

mc.name: One with Nothing
mc.oracleText: Discard your hand.

mc.name: Hidetsugu's Second Rite
mc.oracleText: If target player has exactly 10 life, Hidetsugu's Second Rite deals 10 damage to that player.

mc.name: Measure of Wickedness
mc.oracleText:
At the end of your turn, sacrifice Measure of Wickedness and you lose 8 life.
Whenever another card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, target opponent gains control of Measure of Wickedness.

mc.name: Shape Stealer
mc.oracleText: Whenever Shape Stealer blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, change Shape Stealer's power and toughness to that creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

mc.name: Plow Through Reito
mc.oracleText: Sweep - Return any number of Plains you control to their owner's hand. Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Plains returned this way.

mc.name: Secretkeeper
mc.oracleText: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Secretkeeper gets +2/+2 and has flying.

mc.name: Cloudhoof Kirin
mc.oracleText:
Flying
Whenever you play a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put the top X cards of target player's library into his or her graveyard, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Descendant of Kiyomaro
mc.oracleText: As long as you have more cards in hand than each opponent, Descendant of Kiyomaro gets +1/+2 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain 3 life."

mc.name: Gaze of Adamaro
mc.oracleText: Gaze of Adamaro deals damage equal to the number of cards in target player's hand to that player.

mc.name: Glitterfang
mc.oracleText:
Haste
At end of turn, return Glitterfang to its owner's hand.

mc.name: Overwhelming Intellect
mc.oracleText: Counter target creature spell. Draw cards equal to that spell's converted mana cost.

mc.name: Meishin, the Mind Cage
mc.oracleText: All creatures get -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
